Subject: Method evaluate in MatchesListRegexDecideRule

Hi all,

I'm using Heritrix 3.0.0 and one result of OutOfScope log was:

20=
11-01-05 13:54:48.851 FINER thread-19 org.archive.modules.deciderules.
Matc=
hesListRegexDecideRule.evaluate() Tested 'http://www.abc.com/portal/index.p=
hp?start=3D90' 
match with regex '([a-zA-Z//:.\\\\]+index.php\\?start=3D[0-=
9]+) and result was false

but when I do a similar regexp test in java like=
 this:
String str =3D "http://abc.com/portal/index.php?start=3D90";
Pattern=
 p =3D Pattern.compile("([a-zA-Z//:.\\\\]+index.php\\?start=3D[0-9]+)");
bo=
olean matches =3D p.matcher(str).matches();

the matches will be true.

I s=
aw MatchesListRegexDecideRule.evaluate() implementation and this using java=
 regex.

what goes wrong in this?

Thanks in advance.
